name: A Little to the Left
description:
A Little to the Left reveals the daily household interactions of an individual coping with the feeling of being out of control. Tidy adjustments, sorting, stacking and micro alignments aim to offer relief from a radical possession that holds them with a tight grip.
Instructions:
Uncover the particular arrangement for the items at hand by clicking, dragging and dropping into place. Correctly placed items are straightened up, and cause much less anxiety.
Credits:
Concept: Anne Macmillan, Lukas Steinman
Illustration: Anne Macmillan
Programming: Lukas Steinman
